DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate feasibility network intervention train individual disseminate PrEP information motivate initial PrEP interest knowledge PrEP social network .
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim study : 1 . To recruit 240 participant Chicago , Illinois , train peer change agent ( randomize cross-over group ) disseminate PrEP information motivate PrEP interest knowledge PrEP local network . 2 . To evaluate feasibility program 2 year participant follow-up : 1 ) peer change agent exit survey ; 2 ) peer change agent booster session ; 3 ) peer change agent communication University Chicago PrEP program social medium ; 4 ) referral project ; 5 ) call PrEP warmline .
DOC.criteria: Lives South Side Chicago , Illinois Born male Has sex men previous year Is active Facebook user Does plan leave Chicago
